translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勇者、並の者じゃ戦いにならんほど強いのに）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This hero is so strong that an ordinary person wouldn't stand a chance in battle.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっ……う、動き、速っ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wait... h-how is he moving so fast...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちも、何やってるかよく分かんねー……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't really tell what either of them is doing...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわ……日光さんやブリティシュを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow... it reminds me of Nikkou-san and British..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出すわー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I remember them so well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス様……頑張って、ランス様……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Lord Rance... hang in there, Lord Rance...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、この！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肩口を斬り飛ばすような勇者の一刀を、辛うじて身を捻って避ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He barely twisted his body away to avoid the hero's slash aimed at his shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マントの毛皮が犠牲になって、宙に数本舞う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fur on his cloak was sacrificed, several strands floating in the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その切っ先が再び持ち上がる寸前を突いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just before the blade lifted again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが斬りかかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance struck back with a slash.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を叩き潰さんばかりの勢いで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the force as if to smash his head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが振り下ろされる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos was swung down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 並の剣ならば叩き折られるだろうその一撃を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That strike could have broken an ordinary sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エスクードソードが弾く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the Escudo Sword deflected it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっほ。こっちの剣も業物じゃな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa. This sword is a fine weapon too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂といい勝負しそう。やるねキミ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like it could rival mine. Not bad, you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、鬱陶しい……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, annoying...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスはそのまま剣を滑らせて手指を狙うが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios slid his sword aiming for the fingers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは強引に打ち払ってそれを阻止する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Rance forcibly struck it away to stop him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我慢比べじゃのー。ま、強者同士だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a test of endurance, huh? Well, that's usually how it goes between strong opponents..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたいはそうなるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ... Usually, that's how it ends up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスは素早く体勢を立て直し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios quickly regained his stance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 精緻な足捌きで間合いを計り……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: measuring distance carefully with precise footwork...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましいわ、この駄剣が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up, you useless sword!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……イライラが沸点に達したランスに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Rance, whose irritation had reached its boiling point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣を投げつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hurled his magic sword at him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にょ、にょわーーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nyo, nyowaaaa!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりの事態に、アリオスの反応が僅かに遅れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios was momentarily delayed in his reaction due to the unexpected situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも回転しながら飛ぶカオスを剣で受け止め、叩き落とす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, he caught the spinning Chaos sword mid-air with his own and knocked it down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前の喋りが鬱陶しいのだ、馬鹿剣めが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your chatter's annoying, you stupid sword!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いながら、ランスは駆け込んで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying this, Rance charged forward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスの懐に入りこむ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and slipped inside Arios’ guard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラーーーンスライディングーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Raaance slidinggg!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横薙ぎに一閃されたアリオスの剣をくぐり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dodging under Arios' horizontally slashing blade,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの足がアリオスの足首を蹴りつける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s foot kicked at Arios’ ankle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ……！　そんな真似を、っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... Don’t do that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、奇襲成功！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! The surprise attack succeeded!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にょ、にょわにょわ……おおっと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nyo, nyowanyo... oops!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時にカオスを拾い上げ、身体を跳ね起こす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, he picked up Chaos and bounced his body upright.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切っ先に体重を乗せて、膝をついたアリオスの胴めがけて突き込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He put all his weight into the tip and thrust toward the torso of Arios, who was kneeling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身を捻るが間に合わず、アリオスは脇腹を抉られる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios twisted his body but was too slow, and the sword gouged his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが逃げようとはせず、踏み込みと同時に首を狙う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But instead of retreating, he stepped in and aimed for the neck at the same time.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the Escudo Sword deflected it.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa. This sword is a fine weapon too.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like it could rival mine. Not bad, you."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, annoying...!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a test of endurance, huh? Well, that's usually how it goes between strong opponents..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたいはそうなるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ... Usually, that's how it ends up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスは素早く体勢を立て直し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios quickly regained his stance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 精緻な足捌きで間合いを計り……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: measuring distance carefully with precise footwork...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましいわ、この駄剣が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up, you useless sword!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……イライラが沸点に達したランスに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Rance, whose irritation had reached its boiling point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣を投げつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hurled his magic sword at him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にょ、にょわーーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nyo, nyowaaaa!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりの事態に、アリオスの反応が僅かに遅れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios was momentarily delayed in his reaction due to the unexpected situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも回転しながら飛ぶカオスを剣で受け止め、叩き落とす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, he caught the spinning Chaos sword mid-air with his own and knocked it down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前の喋りが鬱陶しいのだ、馬鹿剣めが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your chatter's annoying, you stupid sword!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いながら、ランスは駆け込んで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying this, Rance charged forward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスの懐に入りこむ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and slipped inside Arios’ guard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラーーーンスライディングーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Raaance slidinggg!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横薙ぎに一閃されたアリオスの剣をくぐり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dodging under Arios' horizontally slashing blade,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの足がアリオスの足首を蹴りつける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s foot kicked at Arios’ ankle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ……！　そんな真似を、っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... Don’t do that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、奇襲成功！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! The surprise attack succeeded!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にょ、にょわにょわ……おおっと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nyo, nyowanyo... oops!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時にカオスを拾い上げ、身体を跳ね起こす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, he picked up Chaos and bounced his body upright.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切っ先に体重を乗せて、膝をついたアリオスの胴めがけて突き込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He put all his weight into the tip and thrust toward the torso of Arios, who was kneeling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身を捻るが間に合わず、アリオスは脇腹を抉られる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios twisted his body but was too slow, and the sword gouged his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが逃げようとはせず、踏み込みと同時に首を狙う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But instead of retreating, he stepped in and aimed for the neck at the same time.
